dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Here's a summary of your mystical activities.

schedule.title: Schedule New Appointment
schedule.step2_desc: Choose one or more services for the session.
schedule.step3_desc: When will the appointment take place?
schedule.summary_desc: Please review the details below before confirming.
schedule.success_toast_desc: An appointment for {{name}} on {{date}} has been added.

add.title: Add New Client
add.description: Enter the new client's details below. They will be added to your roster.
add.success_toast_desc: The new client has been successfully added to your roster.
add.error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.

reading.title: New AI Reading
reading.description: Draw cards and generate an AI-powered tarot interpretation for your client.
reading.spreadDescription: The cards representing past, present, and future.
reading.loadingMessage: The spirits are whispering... generating interpretation...

toast.missingInfoDesc: Please select a client and draw cards first.
toast.failedDesc: The spirits are quiet right now. Please try again later.

services.title: Services
services.pageDescription: An overview of the tarot reading services offered.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.description: Manage your public-facing tarot reader profile.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your application and service offerings.

specializations.title: Service Specializations
specializations.description: Manage the types of readings you offer to clients.

durations.title: Session Durations & Pricing
durations.description: Define the length and cost of your various appointment types.

payment.title: Payment Methods
payment.description: Configure how you accept payments from clients.
